GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
RDMA/rxe: Prevent faulty rkey generation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit d7c71f93cfac8553efc6eea2d97012616aa7ec4c, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 0994a1bcd5f7c0bf7ca3b4938d4f0f6928ac7886. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
